code: import React,{useState}from"react";import MealCalendar from"./MealCalendar";import"./styles.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[dishes,setDishes]=useState("");const[mealPlan,setMealPlan]=useState(null);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/generate_meal_plan",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({dishes:dishes.split(",")})});const data=await response.json();if(response.ok){setMealPlan(data.meal_plan);}else{console.error(data.error);}}catch(error){console.error("Error:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Weekly Meal Planner"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Enter Dishes (comma-separated):",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:dishes,onChange:e=>setDishes(e.target.value),placeholder:"e.g., Pizza, Salad, Soup"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Generate Meal Plan"})]}),mealPlan&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MealCalendar,{mealPlan:mealPlan})]});}export default App;
